Neck Mahogany, Deep Joint. Scale 22F. 24.75inch (628mm), Gibson Medium Scale. Nut Width About 1.69inch (43mm). Pickup Neck : Bacchus HBC1N-ZF. Bridge : Bacchus HBC1B-ZF. Control 2Volume, 2Tone, 3Way Toggle-SW. Bridge Tune O Machic Stop Tailpiece. Machine heads Bacchus Original. Color Cherry Sunburst. Weight About 7.32pound ( 3.32Kg ) This is Used Guitar. I was shooting a lot of photos. Please confirm with a photograph. PRE-LOVED. Former owner is woman. Long time, It has not been used. It was sleep in warehouse. That evidence are the Frets and very little scratches of the body. The remaining amount of the Frets are many. You do not have to change the frets for some time. It keeps Excellent condition ! It has a shine like a brand new guitar. It is a LIMITED model not listed in the japanese catalog. The usual UNIVERSE Series is Flame Maple Top or Quilted Maple Top. However this model is Maple Plain top. I can say very rare model. And this Maple Plain Top is very beautiful. You can see the birds eye in the maple top by see angle. It was manufactured in 2013. Bacchus dispatched the japanese guitar craftman to china. In that management, Bacchus UNIVERSE Series has made in china. Therefore making is very polite. Dielectric paint has been painted in a wide range. Bacchus is Japanese Brand. Reputation in Japan, very good at high quality. Enjoy the Les Paul sound of High quality. About guitar play, Current state, the space between the strings and the frets is standard. And, remaining amount of the Frets are many. Thanks to that, I feel easy to play the guitar. This Bacchus is Deep joint. Therefore Un pluged sound is very loud. You can feel vibrations transmitted to the body. The pickups are Bacchus original. It gives very good distortion sound and clean sound. It can say that it can correspond to various music. Let's enjoy Bacchus ! It is cleanliness. I polished with guitar exclusive polish, so it is in a very clean state. I after the finger board cleaning, painted beeswax. The aim is moisturizing and and protection. Current neck condition, very good ! roughly straight ! There is no problem with the Truss rod and it can be adjusted. Remaining Frets are 95% on average. You can play immediately after it is delivered to you. I was set new strings. Regular tuning. ( Inch : 009, 011, 016, 024, 032, 042 )Guitar playing, is comfortable. All is working well. It is in a very good condition. The Truss rod Wrench is not included. All Original.Note : I changed the bridge's tone pot and the output jack to new one.
